title: wine_Lemelson_2008_Thea's_Selection_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 116287.
country: US.
description: Thea's, the blended offering in Lemelson's stable of single vineyard Pinots, advances the idea that blends are often the most complete wines in a lineup. Though each of Lemelson's single vineyard wines has its own unique particularity, this wine takes the best of them and gracefully pulls them all together. A gentle mix of spice, floral, mocha, forest and chocolate streaks, it is buttressed with firm purple fruits and polished tannins..
designation: Thea's Selection.
points: 90.
price: 30.0.
province: Oregon.
